qas.question: In Australia, how many universities are recognized as Universities of Technology?

context: In the higher education sector, there are <a0_0>seven<a0_0/> designated Universities of Technology in Australia (though, note, not all use the phrase "university of technology", such as the Universities of Canberra and South Australia, which used to be Colleges of Advanced Education before transitioning into fully-fledged universities with the ability - most important of all - to confer doctorates):
